author: Staff Reporter
text:
VIT University Chennai is in the process of developing a social business incubator—seed funded by British Council, and in collaboration with the University of Cambridge, Judge Business School, UK and Tech Mahindra, Bangalore.

In this connection, VIT-SBI is organising a one-day workshop on ‘innovation and social entrepreneurship’ at VIT University in Chennai on March 16.

There is no registration fee for participating members (students, faculty members and innovators) who are keen on social entrepreneurship. For more details about the workshop, visit www.vitsbi.com .

All selected members will receive a confirmation mail. The names of selected participants will be displayed on the VIT-SBI website on March 12. The selection will be based on first-come-first-serve basis for those who submit all the information.
title: Workshop on social entrepreneurship
